basics.name: Nati Getahun
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Hello! I'm Nati, a Software Engineer who has specialized in Security in the past and is looking for Developer Productivity or Reliability/Observability related roles.

work.summary: Led the Security Review process, developed internal tooling and automated security testing and managed an intern
highlights: Collaborated with over 100 co-workers from 80 different teams to understand and reduce security risk through design and code reviews as the lead of the Security Review process.
Developed and deployed security mitigations that directly incorporated into engineer's workflows and provided real-time guidance on high confidence risks.

work.summary: Developed tools, managed incident response and identified vulnerabilities for the product security team.
highlights: Designed and developed internal applications to automate away security related concerns.
Developed product security monitoring tools to automate the identification of critical components in a constantly evolving and large organization without blocking developers.
Facilitated product incidence response, quickly identifying solutions and delegating efforts.

work.summary: Performed dozens of security assessments of a wide range of platforms of various size and complexity.
highlights: Identified critical vulnerabilities in Web Applications (Rails, Spring, Django, etc), iOS and Android applications, REST and SOAP APIs, internal and external networks, Linux Host Configurations and SSO deployments
Tech lead complex projects solo and as part of a group
Wrote internal Python tools to simplify day to day testing

work.summary: Provided programming support for two research projects, one that attempted to get a better understanding of the Zero Day market and bug bounties and another that attempted to optimize SMT solvers.
Performed security assessments, improved automated phishing detection software and developed new APIs to interact with vendors.
Researched security vulnerabilities in application control software and their impact on Lumension's software and developed toolings to automate those tests.
